description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. The pub's closed, everyone's drunk, someone said something about yo momma. Can you maintain your balance long enough to K.O. your opponent? Includes 16 player tournaments and the controversial Mankini, the warriors best friend for unrestricted movement in any fighting situation!
